meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7867.

td.p: Maya Wright, a senior from Peachtree City, Georgia (subtotal of $7,800)
Claire Sattler, a senior from Bonita Springs, Florida (subtotal of $21,800)
Emma Arnold, a junior from Owings Mills, Maryland (subtotal of $19,000)

tr.td: SCORPIOS
THE OLYMPICS
THE HUMAN BODY
SILENT "G"
THE LAST
RESORT

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Emma
Claire
Maya
WHAT KILLED ME?
(Alex: Not who, but what. The manner of death.)
AMERICAN LITERATURE
HISTORIC TRIOS
ROOM SERVICE
ASIAN GEOGRAPHY
FORWARDS & BACKWARDS
(Alex: We'll need two words for each response, and each one will be the reverse of the other.)
